titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to modify the treatment of applications for projects to construct new State homes, and for other purposes.
Veteran State Home Grant Backlog Reduction Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
